title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21001 Experiments related to measurement of pressure and boundary layer characteristics.

title: Concepts taught in class
text: Basics Aerodynamics experiments starting with Bernoulli's principle verification to experiments in Wind Tunnels

title: Student Opinion
text: Most of the experiments are related to potential flow theory and flow visualization giving hands on experience of what is taught in theory
